name: Ava (Beaded Flower Hair Clip)
description:
The Ava is an individual flower hair clip.

These pieces are hand made to order in a choice of colours.

You also choose your choice of centre from a diamante or pearl.

Each flower is set on a crocodile clip which is versatile in any hairstyle.

Each clip come in an organza keepsake bag.

Order time 3-4 weeks (this may be longer depending on colour choice) Please contact me if needed sooner as we try to accommodate any request.

Choose from popular colours shown in colour chart or contact me for a specific colour...

description:
Bella is an individual beaded flower set on a background of leaves.

This style can be made on a silver metal hairband or a comb.

Chose from popular colours in the colour chart or contact me for a specific colour for the flower with a choice or either crystal, ivory or silver leaves.

You can also choose the centre of the flower from a diamante or pearl.

Order time 3-4 weeks (this may be longer depending on colour choice) Please contact me if needed sooner as we try to accommodate any request.

Comes in a white keepsake box.

All bridal pieces are sent 1st Class Recorded Mail
